article_title: Indian Central Banker Raghuram Rajan Criticizes Fed
article_text:
WASHINGTON—India's central bank chief Thursday criticized U.S. Federal Reserve officials for not expressing more concern about the financial turmoil their low-interest rate policies have unleashed in emerging-market economies.

Raghuram Rajan criticized the Fed for failing to include in its January policy statement any mention of the volatility in emerging markets at the time, saying that it seemed to suggest that the Fed would go its own way without paying much attention to what was happening abroad. Yet in private...
